FuncDef: The reset command restores the default settings of all parameters of a dot1x template.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query the default settings of dot1x template parameters in an 802.1X authentication scenario, run the reset command to restore the default settings. Then, run the display dot1x-template command to query the default settings.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
